About me

Being passionate about products and services and how they are created, I have shaped my professional career around the product lifecycle.

I am a results-oriented individual with over 5 years of experience covering project and product management in retail, including developing, implementing, launching and supporting the physical assortment to increase sales volumes and bring new happy customers.

Looking for a remote job only.

I’m happy to join and be part of a passionate team that loves what they do.
